summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5889 for the improvement of Ferdinand Street, from Beacon Avenue to 28th Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77589, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
